{{Infobox company | company_name = Q-Sensei Corp. | company_type = Private company|Private | foundation = 2007 | location = [[Brooklyn, NY]], New York, USA | key_people = Ute Rother, co-founder and CEO
Wolfram Kerber, co-founder and SVP Software Development
Jason Simon, VP Product Development | industry = [[Information technology]]
[[Search-based applications]]
[[Search engine technology|Search technology]] | products = Q-Sensei Enterprise
FeedBooster
Q-Sensei Scholar | homepage = http://www.qsensei.com }} '''Q-Sensei''' is a privately owned software company developing search technology and [[search-based applications]] for searching through [[unstructured data|unstructured]] and [[structured data]] on the internet, business networks, private computers, databases and hand-held devices. Q-Sensei is based on multi-dimensional search, which combines [[full text search|full text]], [[faceted search]] and content analysis to present data organized and correlated along multiple categories or "dimensions" (e.g. date, tag, author, source, language, content type, etc.).{{cite news|url=http://www.pandia.com/sew/4180-q-sensei-enterprise-search-solution.html|title=Q-Sensei enterprise search solution|date=Oct 9, 2011|publisher=Pandia Search News|last=Koch|first=Susanne}} This lets the end user dive deeper into a search query on multiple fronts. Q-Sensei was formed in 2007 through the merger of German-based social knowledge network Lalisio and the US search technology company, QUASM. The company is headquartered in [[Brooklyn, NY]].{{cite news|url=http://betabeat.com/2012/04/armed-with-a-big-data-offering-and-a-brooklyn-office-q-sensei-eyes-america/|title=Armed with a big data offering and a Brooklyn Office, Q-Sensei eyes America|date=Apr 25, 2012|publisher=BetaBeat|last=Faircloth|first=Kelly}} Its European office is in [[Erfurt]], Germany. Its name is derived from the Japanese word ''[[Sensei]]'', meaning "master" or "mentor". ==Products/applications== * '''Q-Sensei Enterprise''' -- a "next-generation" [[enterprise search]] platform "for all kinds of data.".{{cite news|url=http://www.cmswire.com/cms/enterprise-cms/nextgeneration-enteprise-search-platform-for-all-kinds-of-data-010788.php|title=Next Generation Enterprise Search Platform for All Kinds of Data|date=Apr 14, 2011|publisher=CMS Wire|last=Peacock|first=Marisa}} * '''FeedBooster''' (feeds.qsensei.com) -- an RSS/[[web feed]] [[news aggregator|aggregator]] and feed reader that "lets you search or filter the information in your feeds"{{cite news|url=http://www.pandia.com/sew/4183-feedbooster-a-tool-for-real-news-junkies.html|title=FeedBooster, a tool for real news junkies|date=Oct 9, 2011|publisher=Pandia Search News|last=Koch|first=Susanne}} * '''Q-Sensei Scholar''' (scholar.qsensei.com) -- an online service to search for information on books and scholarly articles in science, medicine, mathematics, medicine and literature from the [[Library of Congress]], the [[National Library of Medicine]], [[arXiv]], [[Ingenta]]Connect, and [[Research Papers in Economics|Research Papers in Economics (RePEC)]].{{cite news|url=http://newsbreaks.infotoday.com/NewsBreaks/Science--Gains-Another-Search-Engine-QSensei-From-Lalisio-50370.asp|title=Science 2.0 Gains Another Search Engine|date=Aug 21, 2008|publisher=Information Today|last=Quint|first=Barbara}} ==Awards== * {{cite web|url=http://www.kmworld.com/Articles/Editorial/Features/KMWorld-100-Companies-That-Matter-in-Knowledge-Management-87872.aspx|title= KMWorld "100 Companies That Matter in Knowledge Management" 2013}} * Frost & Sullivan 2012 Global Enterprise Search Price Performance Value Award * {{cite web|url=http://www.kmworld.com/Articles/Editorial/Feature/KMWorld-Trend-Setting-Products-of-2012-84552.aspx|title= KMWorld "Trend-Setting Products of 2012"}} (for Q-Sensei Enterprise){{cite news|url=http://opensearchnews.com/2012/09/q-sensei-bags-kmworlds-trend-setting-product-of-2012-award/|title=Q-Sensei Bags KMWorld Trend-Setting Product of 2012 Award|date=Sep. 18, 2012|publisher=Open Search News|last=Llamanzares|first=Lauren}} * {{cite web|url=http://www.imittelstand.de/themen/topthema_100570.html|title= 2012 Innovationspreis IT, Wissensmanagement}} (IT Innovations Award Winner, Knowledge Management category) * {{cite web|url=http://www.frost.com/prod/servlet/press-release.pag?docid=243778989&ctxixpLink=FcmCtx5&ctxixpLabel=FcmCtx6|title= Frost & Sullivan 2011 North American Enterprise Search New Product Innovation Award}} * {{cite web|url=http://www.idc.com/getdoc.jsp?containerId=prUS23106411|title= 2011 Innovative Business Analytics Companies Under $100M to Watch}}
